challenges.title: Landing Page
challenges.description: Create a responsive landing page for a product or service. The page should adapt and display properly on different devices.
appRequirements: Include a header section with a logo and navigation menu
Display key features or selling points of the product/service
Include a call-to-action button or form for users to take action
Ensure the layout adjusts smoothly and maintains readability on various screen sizes

challenges.title: Image Gallery
challenges.description: Build an image gallery that showcases a collection of photos. The gallery should be responsive and offer a pleasant user experience.
appRequirements: Display multiple images in a grid layout
Enable users to click on an image to view it in a larger size
Include navigation arrows or indicators to switch between images
Allow users to filter images based on categories or tags

challenges.title: Interactive Form
challenges.description: Develop an interactive form that collects user input and provides real-time feedback or validation.
appRequirements: Include various input fields such as text, email, password, and dropdowns
Validate form fields and display error messages for invalid input
Implement real-time validation as users type or interact with the form
Provide visual indicators for valid and invalid input
Include a submit button that triggers form submission and displays a success message

challenges.title: Mobile Menu
challenges.description: Create a responsive mobile menu that expands and collapses smoothly on smaller screens.
appRequirements: Design and implement a mobile-friendly navigation menu
Ensure the menu collapses into a burger icon or similar on smaller screens
Implement smooth transitions or animations for menu expansion and collapse
Allow users to navigate to different sections or pages within the menu
Ensure the menu remains accessible and functional on various mobile devices

challenges.title: Animated Slideshow
challenges.description: Build an animated slideshow that showcases a series of images or content in an engaging way.
appRequirements: Display multiple slides with images and accompanying text
Implement smooth transitions or animations between slides
Include navigation arrows or indicators for users to navigate through the slideshow
Allow users to pause or resume the slideshow
Make the slideshow responsive to different screen sizes

challenges.title: Pricing Table
challenges.description: Create a pricing table that presents different pricing plans or packages for a product or service.
appRequirements: Display multiple pricing options with details such as features and prices
Ensure the table adjusts and maintains readability on different devices
Highlight the recommended or most popular pricing plan
Include call-to-action buttons for users to select a pricing option

challenges.title: Newsletter Subscription
challenges.description: Develop a newsletter subscription form that allows users to subscribe to a newsletter.
appRequirements: Include input fields for users to enter their name and email address
Implement validation to ensure the email address is in the correct format
Provide visual feedback on successful subscription or validation errors
Make the newsletter subscription form responsive and visually appealing

challenges.title: Quiz Application
challenges.description: Create a quiz application that presents multiple-choice questions and provides instant feedback to users.
appRequirements: Include a set of multiple-choice questions with options
Allow users to select an answer for each question
Provide immediate feedback on whether the selected answer is correct or incorrect
Display the final score and percentage at the end of the quiz

challenges.title: Countdown Timer
challenges.description: Build a countdown timer that counts down to a specific date or event.
appRequirements: Allow users to set a target date and time for the countdown
Display the remaining time in days, hours, minutes, and seconds
Implement a visually appealing design for the countdown
Ensure the countdown timer adjusts and remains functional on different screen sizes
